statements: DELETE FROM Trees WHERE farmer_id = 100 AND tree_species = 'Oak';
DELETE FROM Trees WHERE planting_date < '2021-01-01' AND farmer_id = 5
DELETE FROM PlantingActivity WHERE activity_id = 100 AND tree_species = 'Apple';
DELETE FROM farmers WHERE name = 'John Doe' AND address = '123 Main Street'
DELETE FROM trees WHERE height < 5 OR planting_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE start_date < '2020-09-01' OR end_date > '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM Trees WHERE tree_species = 'Oak' AND tree_height > 10.0;
